script.code:
echo "--- BEGIN Resume_Elasticsearch ---"
CONTAINER=$variables_ELASTICSEARCH_INSTANCE_NAME
echo "*_instance name: $CONTAINER"
if [ "$(docker ps -a | grep $CONTAINER)" ]; then RUNNING=$(docker inspect --format="{{ .State.Running }}" $CONTAINER 2> /dev/null) STOPPED=$(docker inspect --format="{{ .State.Status }}" $CONTAINER 2> /dev/null)
if [ "$RUNNING" == "true" ]; then echo "$CONTAINER container is running" elif [ "$STOPPED" == "exited" ]; then echo "Starting $CONTAINER container" docker start $CONTAINER fi fi echo "--- END Resume_Elasticsearch ---"
